repairedDockerfile:
#THIS FILE WAS GENERATED BY ./generate_dockerfiles.sh. DO NOT MODIFY.
FROM balenalib/armv7hf-ubuntu:focal
RUN [ "cross-build-start" ]
ENV INITSYSTEM on

LABEL maintainer="me@murt.is"
RUN apt-get -q update && apt-get upgrade -yq && apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y \
                      libstdc++6 && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;
RUN apt-get clean && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*
RUN mkdir /data
RUN ls /opt
WORKDIR /data
RUN [ "cross-build-end" ]
